text: f the Underworld, Closing the Halls of Amenti, Guardianship of the Arc of the Covenant transferred to Hibiru Cloister, Deactivation of the Rod and the Staff and the Templar-Axion Seal, Tutankhamon and Haremhab. 1362 BC -1309 BC Akhenaton successfully practiced the rites of ascension among the Annu populations from 1367 BC to 1362 BC, following directives from the Priests of Ur in the Inner Earth. Tensions began to mount between Akhenaton and the Ur Priesthood when he was instructed to begin ascending other individu- als not of Annu lineage.
